solution_line_template: He has {months_to_save} months to save ${total_savings_goal} so that's {total_savings_goal}/{months_to_save} = $<<{total_savings_goal}/{months_to_save}={monthly_savings_needed}>>{monthly_savings_needed} a month

He gets paid twice a month so he needs to save {monthly_savings_needed}/{paychecks_per_month} = $<<{monthly_savings_needed}/{paychecks_per_month}={savings_per_paycheck}>>{savings_per_paycheck} from each paycheck
